name: LD50 - Extremely Extreme Sports
description:
MMO downhill racing game

Features:

  • Online multiplayer

  • Character customization

  • Emoting

  • A little bit of gameplay

Blow up the mountain to start the avalanche. Now try to delay your inevitable demise.

Before you do that though, make sure you look stylish.

Controls:

  • Space when near the detonator - start the race
  • Left/Right or A/D - control your character
  • 1/2/3/4 - emotes :)
  • H - show/hide player names
  • PageUp/PageDown - control the volume

Tools used:

  • Rust programming language, custom engine
  • Paint.NET
  • Audacity, microphone, mouth
